package.name: Vufind_Vumatch
package.summary: Inspire shoppers with visual & behavioral recommendations & deliver 15% conversion lift
package.description:
vuMatch Visual Product Recommendations

DeepVu’s vuMatch delivers visual recommendations that get smarter with usage to deliver the maximum conversion lift while insipring shoppers to find and purchase products they love.

Deep Learning for AI Commerce

DeepVu’s deep-learning engine analyses your catalog's visual features, and your shoppers reactions to the recommendations to deliver the smartest recommendations based on visual similarity and insights on what’s resonating with your shoppers. The result: an AI-commerce user experience for your shoppers and maximum conversion lift for the retailer.

Conversion Lift

We commit to delivering more than 15% conversion lift quarterly or you can cancel with no further obligation!
